scripts.dev:safe: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); try { if (fs.existsSync('.next/trace')) { require('child_process').execSync('del /f /q \".next\\trace\"', {stdio: 'ignore'}); } } catch(e) {}" && next dev
scripts.clean:trace: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const path = require('path'); try { if (fs.existsSync('.next/trace')) { fs.chmodSync('.next/trace', 0o666); fs.unlinkSync('.next/trace'); } } catch(e) { console.log('Trace cleanup:', e.message); }"
scripts.clean:next: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); try { if (fs.existsSync('.next')) { fs.rmSync('.next', {recursive: true, force: true, maxRetries: 3, retryDelay: 100}); } } catch(e) { console.log('Next cleanup:', e.message); }"
scripts.dev:clean: npm run kill:ports && npm run clean:windows && next dev
